p: HBPG was synthesized as described, 7 and ACV and PFA were purchased from Sigma (St. Louis, MO). Cidofovir (CDF) was a gift from Gilead Sciences Inc. (Foster City, CA). The McKrae strain of HSV-1 was isolated by Dr. Kaufman (LSU Eye Center, New Orleans, LA) and the F strain of HSV-1 and G strain of HSV-2 were obtained from the American Type Culture Collection (Manassas, VA). All viruses were propagated and titered on Vero cells, and stored frozen until use.
